ActorTalk: Sometimes I do find this PhD status comes in handy after all.
What, because it ranks a little higher in the lab?
No, even if I go mad from experiments one day.
Mad Doctor... has a nice ring to it. I'd make a pretty strong supervillain.
What if it were another degree? Master's? Mad Master's?
Tsk... that just sounds like some poor guy stuck on their thesis.
